Integer.Name: Standard
Integer.ToolTip: Unique Identification of the CoaXPress Standard.
Integer.Description: Unique Identification of the CoaXPress Standard.

Integer.Name: Revision
Integer.ToolTip: Revision of the CoaXPress specifciation implemented.
Integer.Description: Revision of the CoaXPress specifciation implemented.

Integer.Name: XmlManifestSize
Integer.ToolTip: The number of XML manifests available.
Integer.Description: The number of XML manifests available.

Integer.Name: XmlManifestSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects the XML manifest entry.
Integer.Description: Selects the XML manifest entry.

Integer.Name: XmlVersion
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the version of the XML file referenced by the XmlManifestSelector.
Integer.Description: Indicates the version of the XML file referenced by the XmlManifestSelector.

Integer.Name: XmlSchemeVersion
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the scheme version of the XML file referenced by the XmlManifestSelector.
Integer.Description: Indicates the scheme version of the XML file referenced by the XmlManifestSelector.

Integer.Name: XmlUrlAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the start of the URL string referenced by the XmlManifestSelector.
Integer.Description: Indicates the start of the URL string referenced by the XmlManifestSelector.

Integer.Name: Iidc2Address
Integer.ToolTip: If the Device supports the IIDC2 protocol, then this register shall provide the address of the start of the IIDC2 register space.
Integer.Description: If the Device supports the IIDC2 protocol, then this register shall provide the address of the start of the IIDC2 register space.

Integer.Name: ConnectionReset
Integer.ToolTip: Resets all connections of the Device.
Integer.Description: Resets all connections of the Device.

Integer.Name: DeviceConnectionID
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the ID of the Device connection via which this register is read.
Integer.Description: Provides the ID of the Device connection via which this register is read.

Integer.Name: MasterHostConnectionID
Integer.ToolTip: Holds the Host Link ID of the Host Connection connected to the Device Master connection.
Integer.Description: Holds the Host Connection ID of the Host connection connected to the Device Master connection.

Integer.Name: ControlPacketSizeMax
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the maximum control packet data size. The size is defined in bytes, and shall be a multiple of 4 bytes.
Integer.Description: Provides the maximum control packet data size. The size is defined in bytes, and shall be a multiple of 4 bytes.

Integer.Name: StreamPacketSizeMax
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the maximum stream packet data size the Host can accept. The size is defined in bytes, and shall be a multiple of 4 bytes.
Integer.Description: Provides the maximum stream packet data size the Host can accept. The size is defined in bytes, and shall be a multiple of 4 bytes.

Enumeration.Name: ConnectionConfig
Enumeration.ToolTip: Holds a valid combination of Device connection speed and number of active connections.
Enumeration.Description: Holds a valid combination of Device connection speed and number of active connections.

Enumeration.Name: ConnectionConfigDefault
Enumeration.ToolTip: Holds a valid default mode combination of Device connection speed and number of active connections.
Enumeration.Description: Holds a valid default mode combination of Device connection speed and number of active connections.

Enumeration.Name: TestMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Enable test packet transmission from Device to Host.
Enumeration.Description: Enable test packet transmission from Device to Host.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Video packets are being transferred, normal mode.
EnumEntry.Description: Video packets are being transferred, normal mode.

EnumEntry.Name: Mode1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Test packets are being transferred, test mode.
EnumEntry.Description: Test packets are being transferred, test mode.

Integer.Name: TestErrorCountSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects the TestErrorCount register. Selection shall be a valid Device Connection ID.
Integer.Description: Selects the TestErrorCount register. Selection shall be a valid Device Connection ID.

Integer.Name: TestErrorCount
Integer.ToolTip: The error count for the connection ID as selected by TestErrorCountSelector.
Integer.Description: The error count for the connection ID as selected by TestErrorCountSelector.

Integer.Name: TestPacketCountTx
Integer.ToolTip: The transmitted test packet count for the connection ID as selected by TestErrorCountSelector.
Integer.Description: The transmitted test packet count for the connection ID as selected by TestErrorCountSelector.

Integer.Name: TestPacketCountRx
Integer.ToolTip: The received test packet count for the connection ID as selected by TestErrorCountSelector.
Integer.Description: The received test packet count for the connection ID as selected by TestErrorCountSelector.

Enumeration.Name: ElectricalCompliancyTest
Enumeration.ToolTip: To be used for the formal electrical compliancy testing of the Device.
Enumeration.Description: To be used for the formal electrical compliancy testing of the Device.

EnumEntry.Name: NormalOperatingMode
EnumEntry.ToolTip: When set to 0, the device is working in normal non compliancy mode.
EnumEntry.Description: When set to 0, the device is working in normal non compliancy mode.

Integer.Name: WidthAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the address in the manufacturer-specific register space of the feature with the corresponding name.
Integer.Description: Provides the address in the manufacturer-specific register space of the feature with the corresponding name.

Integer.Name: HeightAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the address in the manufacturer-specific register space of the feature with the corresponding name.
Integer.Description: Provides the address in the manufacturer-specific register space of the feature with the corresponding name.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionModeAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the address in the manufacturer-specific register space of the feature with the corresponding name.
Integer.Description: Provides the address in the manufacturer-specific register space of the feature with the corresponding name.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionStartAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the address in the manufacturer-specific register space of the feature with the corresponding name.
Integer.Description: Provides the address in the manufacturer-specific register space of the feature with the corresponding name.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionStopAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the address in the manufacturer-specific register space of the feature with the corresponding name.
Integer.Description: Provides the address in the manufacturer-specific register space of the feature with the corresponding name.

Integer.Name: PixelFormatAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the address in the manufacturer-specific register space of the feature with the corresponding name.
Integer.Description: Provides the address in the manufacturer-specific register space of the feature with the corresponding name.

Integer.Name: DeviceTapGeometryAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the address in the manufacturer-specific register space of the feature with the corresponding name.
Integer.Description: Provides the address in the manufacturer-specific register space of the feature with the corresponding name.

Integer.Name: Image1StreamIDAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the address in the manufacturer-specific register space of the feature with the corresponding name.
Integer.Description: Provides the address in the manufacturer-specific register space of the feature with the corresponding name.

Integer.Name: HsUpconnection
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the Device support of the optional high speed upconnection.
Integer.Description: Indicates the Device support of the optional high speed upconnection.

String.Name: DeviceVendorName
String.ToolTip: Name of the manufacturer of the device.
String.Description: Name of the manufacturer of the device.

String.Name: DeviceVersion
String.Description: Version of the device (user read only).

String.Name: DeviceFirmwareVersion
String.ToolTip: Version of the firmware in the device.
String.Description: Version of the firmware in the device.

String.Name: DeviceSerialNumber
String.Description: Device serial number (identifier, user read only).

Enumeration.Name: DeviceIndicatorMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the behavior of the indicators (such as LEDs) showing the status of the Device.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the behavior of the indicators (such as LEDs) showing the status of the Device.

Integer.Name: BuiltInTest
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the Built In Test status of the camera.
Integer.Description: Returns the Built In Test status of the camera.

Integer.Name: BuiltInTestStorage
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the Storage Built In Test status of the camera.
Integer.Description: Returns the Storage Built In Test status of the camera.

Integer.Name: BuiltInTestTemperature
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the Temperature Built In Test status of the camera.
Integer.Description: Returns the Temperature Built In Test status of the camera.

Command.Name: BuiltInTestReset
Command.ToolTip: Resets the Build In Test status of the camera.
Command.Description: Resets the Build In Test status of the camera.

Integer.Name: ElapsedPowerOnTime
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the elapsed power on time in hours since manufacturing.
Integer.Description: Returns the elapsed power on time in hours since manufacturing.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceTemperatureSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the location within the device, where the temperature will be measured.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the location within the device, where the temperature will be measured.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceControlError
Enumeration.ToolTip: Returns the latest Device control error after a write command.
Enumeration.Description: Returns the latest Device control error after a write command.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceScanType
Enumeration.ToolTip: Scan type of the sensor of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Scan type of the sensor of the device.

Integer.Name: SensorWidthMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum actual width of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Maximum actual width of the sensor in pixels.

Integer.Name: SensorHeightMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum actual height of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Maximum actual height of the sensor in pixels.

Integer.Name: AbsSensorWidthMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum width of the sensor in pixels, before processing.
Integer.Description: Maximum width of the sensor in pixels, before processing.

Integer.Name: AbsSensorHeightMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum height of the sensor in pixels, before processing.
Integer.Description: Maximum height of the sensor in pixels, before processing.

Boolean.Name: AdaptiveResolutionEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enable adaptive resolution to project a larger sensor ROI on a smaller output ROI. Use SensorWidth and SensorHeigth for the sensor ROI and Width and Height for the output ROI.
Boolean.Description: Enable adaptive resolution to project a larger sensor ROI on a smaller output ROI. Use SensorWidth and SensorHeigth for the sensor ROI and Width and Height for the output ROI.

Integer.Name: SensorWidth
Integer.ToolTip: Effective width of the sensor in pixels. This feature is ignored when adaptive resolution is disabled.
Integer.Description: Effective width of the sensor in pixels. This feature is ignored when adaptive resolution is disabled.

Integer.Name: SensorHeight
Integer.ToolTip: Effective height of the sensor in pixels. This feature is ignored when adaptive resolution is disabled.
Integer.Description: Effective height of the sensor in pixels. This feature is ignored when adaptive resolution is disabled.

Integer.Name: WidthMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum width (in pixels) of the image.
Integer.Description: Maximum width (in pixels) of the image.

Integer.Name: HeightMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum height (in pixels) of the image.
Integer.Description: Maximum height (in pixels) of the image.

Integer.Name: Width
Integer.ToolTip: Width of the Image provided by the device in pixels.
Integer.Description: Width of the Image provided by the device in pixels.

Integer.Name: Height
Integer.ToolTip: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: BoreSightOffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal bore sight adjustment.
Integer.Description: Horizontal bore sight adjustment.

Integer.Name: BoreSightOffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical bore sight adjustment.
Integer.Description: Vertical bore sight adjustment.

Boolean.Name: Subsampling
Boolean.ToolTip: True, SubsamplingHorizontal and SubsamplingVertical shall be both 2, meaning the value of every 1st horizontal and vertical pixel is kept, 2nd horizontal or vertical pixel is discarded. False, subsampling selection is done via SubsamplingHorizontal and SubsamplingVertical.
Boolean.Description: True, SubsamplingHorizontal and SubsamplingVertical shall be both 2, meaning the value of every 1st horizontal and vertical pixel is kept, 2nd horizontal or vertical pixel is discarded. False, subsampling selection is done via SubsamplingHorizontal and SubsamplingVertical.

Integer.Name: SubsamplingHorizontal
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal sub-sampling of the image. The value of every 1st pixel is kept, 2nd pixel is discarded.
Integer.Description: Horizontal sub-sampling of the image. The value of every 1st pixel is kept, 2nd pixel is discarded.

Integer.Name: SubsamplingVertical
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical sub-sampling of the image. The value of every 1st pixel is kept, 2nd pixel is discarded.
Integer.Description: Vertical sub-sampling of the image. The value of every 1st pixel is kept, 2nd pixel is discarded.

Boolean.Name: ReverseX
Boolean.ToolTip: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device. The Region of interest is applied after the flipping.
Boolean.Description: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device. The Region of interest is applied after the flipping.

Boolean.Name: ReverseY
Boolean.ToolTip: Flip vertically the image sent by the device. The Region of interest is applied after the flipping.
Boolean.Description: Flip vertically the image sent by the device. The Region of interest is applied after the flipping.

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Format of the pixel to use for acquisition. Pixelformat can only be changed if there is no acquisition active.
Enumeration.Description: Format of the pixel to use for acquisition. Pixelformat can only be changed if there is no acquisition active.

Enumeration.Name: TestImageSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of test image that is sent by the camera.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of test image that is sent by the camera.

Integer.Name: TestImageVideoLevel1
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the first testimage video level.
Integer.Description: Sets the first testimage video level.

Integer.Name: TestImageVideoLevel2
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the second testimage video level.
Integer.Description: Sets the second testimage video level.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceTapGeometry
Enumeration.ToolTip: Tap geometry to be used by streams of the Device.
Enumeration.Description: Tap geometry to be used by streams of the Device.

Integer.Name: Image1StreamID
Integer.ToolTip: Identification of stream 1.
Integer.Description: Identification of stream 1.

Boolean.Name: MetaDataOverlay
Boolean.ToolTip: Add meta data overlay in the first 128 pixels of the last line.
Boolean.Description: Add meta data overlay in the first 128 pixels of the last line.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the acquisition mode of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the acquisition mode of the device.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.ToolTip: Starts the Acquisition of the device.
Command.Description: Starts the Acquisition of the device.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStop
Command.ToolTip: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame.
Command.Description: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame.

Float.Name: AcquisitionFrameRate
Float.ToolTip: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.
Float.Description: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.

Float.Name: AcquisitionFramePeriod
Float.ToolTip: Controls the acquisition rate (in 1us steps) at which the frames are captured.
Float.Description: Controls the acquisition rate (in 1us steps) at which the frames are captured.

Command.Name: AcquisitionMaxFrameRate
Command.ToolTip: Sets the camera to the maximum frame rate, whit respect to the given settings
Command.Description: Sets the camera to the maximum frame rate, whit respect to the given settings

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.

Enumeration.Name: ExposureMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter).
Enumeration.Description: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter).

Float.Name: ExposureTimeTriggered
Float.ToolTip: Sets the Exposure time (in 1us steps) when ExposureMode is TimedTriggerControl.
Float.Description: Sets the Exposure time (in 1us steps) when ExposureMode is TimedTriggerControl.

Integer.Name: InterfaceUtilization
Integer.ToolTip: Decreases the line rate of the sensor in order to prevent the framegrabber from being overrun.
Integer.Description: Decreases the line rate of the sensor in order to prevent the framegrabber from being overrun.

Integer.Name: FrameCounter
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the current frame count.
Integer.Description: Returns the current frame count.

Integer.Name: ExposureStartTimestamp
Integer.ToolTip: Measured timestamp in clocks of 74.25Mhz between reception of trigger and actual start of image sensor integration time.
Integer.Description: Measured timestamp in clocks of 74.25Mhz between reception of trigger and actual start of image sensor integration time.

Integer.Name: ExposureStopTimestamp
Integer.ToolTip: Measured timestamp in clocks of 74.25Mhz between reception of trigger and actual end of image sensor integration time.
Integer.Description: Measured timestamp in clocks of 74.25Mhz between reception of trigger and actual end of image sensor integration time.

Enumeration.Name: GainSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Gain is controlled by the various Gain features.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Gain is controlled by the various Gain features.

Float.Name: Gain
Float.ToolTip: Controls the gain as an absolute physical value.
Float.Description: Controls the gain as an absolute physical value.

Float.Name: BlackLevel
Float.ToolTip: Controls the analog black level as an absolute physical value.
Float.Description: Controls the analog black level as an absolute physical value.

Enumeration.Name: Gamma_Selector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the Look Up Table for the Gamma.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the Look Up Table for the Gamma.

Enumeration.Name: WhiteBalance_Mode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the mode of the Auto White Balance.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the mode of the Auto White Balance.

Enumeration.Name: WhiteBalance_UserSetSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Select the current user White Balance to set.
Enumeration.Description: Select the current user White Balance to set.

Integer.Name: WhiteBalance_Width
Integer.ToolTip: Width of the white balance region of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Width of the white balance region of interest (in pixels).

Integer.Name: WhiteBalance_Height
Integer.ToolTip: Height of the white balance region of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Height of the white balance region of interest (in pixels).

Integer.Name: WhiteBalance_dX
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal offset from the center of the AWB detection window (in pixels). Offset can be either positive or negative.
Integer.Description: Horizontal offset from the center of the AWB detection window (in pixels). Offset can be either positive or negative.

Integer.Name: WhiteBalance_dY
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical offset from the center of the AWB detection window (in pixels). Offset can be either positive or negative.
Integer.Description: Vertical offset from the center of the AWB detection window (in pixels). Offset can be either positive or negative.

Command.Name: WhiteBalance_UserCalibrate
Command.ToolTip: Initiates a User White Balance calibratrion.
Command.Description: Initiates a User White Balance calibratrion.

Enumeration.Name: WhiteBalance_UserStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Returns the User White Balance Calibration status.
Enumeration.Description: Returns the User White Balance Calibration status.

Enumeration.Name: AEC_Mode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Enables automatic exposure time and or gain control.
Enumeration.Description: Enables automatic exposure time and or gain control.

Integer.Name: AEC_SetPoint
Integer.ToolTip: This feature represents the setpoint for both AEC and VEM.
Integer.Description: This feature represents the setpoint for both AEC and VEM.

Integer.Name: AEC_Width
Integer.ToolTip: Width of the AEC detection window (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Width of the AEC detection window (in pixels).

Integer.Name: AEC_Height
Integer.ToolTip: Height of the AEC detection window (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Height of the AEC detection window (in pixels).

Integer.Name: AEC_dX
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal offset from the center of the AEC detection window (in pixels). Offset can be either positive or negative.
Integer.Description: Horizontal offset from the center of the AEC detection window (in pixels). Offset can be either positive or negative.

Integer.Name: AEC_dY
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical offset of the AEC detection window (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Vertical offset from the center of the AEC detection window (in pixels). Offset can be either positiv or negative.

Integer.Name: AEC_PeakAverageBalance
Integer.ToolTip: This feature represents the peak average balance ratio.
Integer.Description: This feature represents the peak average balance ratio.

Integer.Name: AEC_SpeedFactor
Integer.ToolTip: This feature represents the speed factor for the AEC.
Integer.Description: This feature represents the speed factor for the AEC.

Float.Name: AEC_MaximumGain
Float.ToolTip: This feature represents the maximum AGC Gain in 0.01x units.
Float.Description: This feature represents the maximum AGC Gain in 0.01x units.

Float.Name: AEC_MaximumExposureTime
Float.ToolTip: This feature represents the maximum AIC exposure time in uS.
Float.Description: This feature represents the maximum AIC exppsure time in uS.

Integer.Name: AEC_AverageDetectionValue
Integer.ToolTip: This feature represents the average detection value in 12 bit resolution.
Integer.Description: This feature represents the average detection value in 12 bit resolution.

Integer.Name: AEC_PeakDetectionValue
Integer.ToolTip: This feature represents the peak detection value in 12 bit resolution.
Integer.Description: This feature represents the peak detection value in 12 bit resolution.

Float.Name: AEC_AppliedGain
Float.ToolTip: This feature represents the applied AGC Gain in 0.01x units.
Float.Description: This feature represents the applied AGC Gain in 0.01x units.

Float.Name: AEC_AppliedExposureTime
Float.ToolTip: This feature represents the applied AIC exposure time in uS.
Float.Description: This feature represents the applied AIC exposure time in uS.

Enumeration.Name: VEM_Mode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the mode of the VEM.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the mode of the VEM.

Integer.Name: VEM_Width
Integer.ToolTip: Width of the VEM measurement window (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Width of the VEM measurement window (in pixels).

Integer.Name: VEM_Height
Integer.ToolTip: Height of the VEM measurement window (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Height of the VEM measurement window (in pixels).

Integer.Name: VEM_dX
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal offset from the center of the VEM measurement window (in pixels). Offset can be either positiv or negative.
Integer.Description: Horizontal offset from the center of the VEM measurement window (in pixels). Offset can be either positive or negative.

Integer.Name: VEM_dY
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical offset from the center of the VEM measurement window (in pixels). Offset can be either positiv or negative.
Integer.Description: Vertical offset from the center of the VEM measurement window (in pixels). Offset can be either positive or negative.

Integer.Name: VEM_SpeedFactor
Integer.ToolTip: This feature represents the speed factor for the VEM in units of 1/64.
Integer.Description: This feature represents the speed factor for the VEM in units of 1/64.

Float.Name: VEM_MaximumGain
Float.ToolTip: Controls the maximum gain of the VEM in units of 0.01x.
Float.Description: Controls the maximum gain of the VEM in units of 0.01x.

Integer.Name: VEM_MaximumBlackShift
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the maximum black shift of the auto black.
Integer.Description: Controls the maximum black shift of the auto black.

Float.Name: VEM_BlackShiftRatio
Float.ToolTip: Controls the black shift mean ratio.
Float.Description: Controls the black shift mean ratio.

Integer.Name: VEM_BlackDetectionValue
Integer.ToolTip: VEM black detection value.
Integer.Description: VEM black detection value.

Integer.Name: VEM_AverageDetectionValue
Integer.ToolTip: VEM average detection value.
Integer.Description: VEM average detection value.

Integer.Name: VEM_AppliedBlackShift
Integer.ToolTip: Amount of subtracted offset due to VEM.
Integer.Description: Amount of subtracted offset due to VEM.

Integer.Name: VEM_AppliedGain
Integer.ToolTip: VEM gain applied to this image. Gain = this value/100.
Integer.Description: VEM gain applied to this image. Gain = this value/100.

Integer.Name: Zoom_Factor
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the digital zoom factor.
Integer.Description: Sets the digital zoom factor.

Integer.Name: Zoom_MaxFactor
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the current maximum digital zoom factor.
Integer.Description: Returns the current maximum digital zoom factor.

Boolean.Name: Zoom_AnimationEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls the animated digital zoom option.
Boolean.Description: Controls the animated digital zoom option.

Integer.Name: Zoom_AnimationSpeed
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the animated digital zoom speed.
Integer.Description: Controls the animated digital zoom speed.

Integer.Name: Zoom_AnimationStepSize
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the animated digital zoom step size.
Integer.Description: Controls the animated digital zoom step size.

Integer.Name: Saturation
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the color saturation percentage level.
Integer.Description: Controls the color saturation percentage level.

Enumeration.Name: SaturationParameter_Selector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the saturation parameter to be set.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the saturation parameter to be set.

Integer.Name: SaturationParameter
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the saturation parameter selected by the selector.
Integer.Description: Sets the saturation parameter selected by the selector.

Enumeration.Name: ColorMatrixCoefficient_Selector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the color matrix coefficient to be set.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the color matrix coefficient to be set.

Integer.Name: ColorMatrixCoefficient
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the color matrix coefficient selected by the selector.
Integer.Description: Sets the color matrix coefficient selected by the selector.

Integer.Name: EdgeEnhancement
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the edge enhancement level in units of 0.01.
Integer.Description: Controls the edge enhancement level in units of 0.01.

Integer.Name: EdgeEnhancement_NoiseReductionStrength
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the edge enhancement noise reduction strength.
Integer.Description: Controls the edge enhancement noise reduction strength.

Integer.Name: SharpnessIndication
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the Sharpness indication value of the camera.
Integer.Description: Returns the Sharpness indication value of the camera.

Integer.Name: SharpnessIndication_Width
Integer.ToolTip: Width of the Sharpness Indication window (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Width of the Sharpness Indication window (in pixels).

Integer.Name: SharpnessIndication_Height
Integer.ToolTip: Height of the Sharpness Indication window (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Height of the Sharpness Indication window (in pixels).

Integer.Name: SharpnessIndication_dX
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal offset from the center of the Sharpness Indication window (in pixels). Offset can be either positive or negative.
Integer.Description: Horizontal offset from the center of the Sharpness Indication window (in pixels). Offset can be either positive or negative.

Integer.Name: SharpnessIndication_dY
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical offset from the center of the Sharpness Indication window (in pixels). Offset can be either positive or negative.
Integer.Description: Vertical offset from the center of the Sharpness Indication window (in pixels). Offset can be either positive or negative.

Boolean.Name: DefectPixelCorrection_Enable
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls the defect correction of the video processing.
Boolean.Description: Controls the defect correction of the video processing.

Enumeration.Name: DefectPixel_TestMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Display defect pixels in an output image.
Enumeration.Description: Display defect pixels in an output image.

Integer.Name: DefectPixel_Total
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the total amount of pixels to be corrected.
Integer.Description: Returns the total amount of pixels to be corrected.

Integer.Name: DefectPixel_Select
Integer.ToolTip: Selects the pixel to be read back.
Integer.Description: Selects the pixel to be read back.

Integer.Name: DefectPixel_ReadX
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the horizontal coordinate of the pixel selected by DefectPixelSelect. The origin of the coordinates is 0.
Integer.Description: Returns the horizontal coordinate of the pixel selected by DefectPixelSelect. The origin of the coordinates is 0.

Integer.Name: DefectPixel_ReadY
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the vertical coordinate of the pixel selected by DefectPixelSelect. The origin of the coordinates is 0.
Integer.Description: Returns the vertical coordinate of the pixel selected by DefectPixelSelect. The origin of the coordinates is 0.

Integer.Name: DefectPixel_WriteX
Integer.ToolTip: Select the horizontal coordinate of the defect pixel being corrected. The origin of the coordinates is 0.
Integer.Description: Select the horizontal coordinate of the defect pixel being corrected. The origin of the coordinates is 0.

Integer.Name: DefectPixel_WriteY
Integer.ToolTip: Select the vertical coordinate of the defect pixel being corrected. The origin of the coordinates is 0.
Integer.Description: Select the vertical coordinate of the defect pixel being corrected. The origin of the coordinates is 0.

Command.Name: DefectPixel_Add
Command.ToolTip: Add the defect pixel determined by DefectPixelWriteX and DefectPixelWriteY to non volatile memory.
Command.Description: Add the defect pixel determined by DefectPixelWriteX and DefectPixelWriteY to non volatile memory.

Command.Name: DefectPixel_Remove
Command.ToolTip: Remove the defect pixel determined by DefectPixelWriteX and DefectPixelWriteY from non volatile memory.
Command.Description: Remove the defect pixel determined by DefectPixelWriteX and DefectPixelWriteY from non volatile memory.

Command.Name: DefectPixel_ClearAll
Command.ToolTip: Clear all defect pixels from non volatile memory.
Command.Description: Clear all defect pixels from non volatile memory.

Command.Name: DefectPixel_Save
Command.ToolTip: Save the defect pixel list as a user list to the non-volatile memory of the device.
Command.Description: Save the defect pixel list as a user list to the non-volatile memory of the device.

Command.Name: DefectPixel_Restore
Command.ToolTip: Restores the defect pixel user list to the device and makes it active.
Command.Description: Restores the defect pixel user list to the device and makes it active.

Command.Name: DefectPixel_RestoreFactoryDefault
Command.ToolTip: Restore the factory default defect pixel table. All existing defect pixel coordinates will be lost.
Command.Description: Restore the factory default defect pixel table. All existing defect pixel coordinates will be lost.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the feature User Set to load, save or configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the feature User Set to load, save or configure.

Command.Name: UserSetSave
Command.ToolTip: Save the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the non-volatile memory of the device.
Command.Description: Save the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the non-volatile memory of the device.

Command.Name: UserSetLoad
Command.ToolTip: Load the User Set specified by UserSetSelector as the current set.
Command.Description: Load the User Set specified by UserSetSelector as the current set.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetDefault
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the User Set to load by default at device startup.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the User Set to load by default at device startup.

Integer.Name: PayloadSize
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel.
Integer.Description: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel.

Integer.Name: TLParamsLocked
Integer.ToolTip: Used by the Transport Layer to prevent critical features from changing during acquisition.
Integer.Description: Used by the Transport Layer to prevent critical features from changing during acquisition.

Port.Name: Device
Port.ToolTip: Port giving access to the device.
